name: BYTTET
description:
BYTTET is a small Bullethell Game where the ROLES are REVERSED. 

Instead of the player getting better and better over time and new enemy classes being added, the enemies become more and more challenging and the player gets completely new abilities.

This makes play on pretty difficult. So can you survive all the waves?

CONTROLS:
  • WASD - Move
  • Left Mouse Button - Shoot (Only possible with a few classes)
  • Space - Dash (Only possible with a few classes)
  • Tab - Pause Menu
CLASSES:

The classes change after each wave in this order

  • TANK: Shoots in 3 Direction (Forward, Left, Right)
  • BOOM: Shoots homing missles
  • MELEE: Run into enemies to kill them
  • RUSH: Shoots forward and backwards
  • SHIELD: Can Dash (with Space) into enemies. Also blocks all enemy shots with his shield
